attributes.action: Prohibit the use of 4x4 "off road" vehicles on surfaced roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Off Road" vehicles have no place on surfaced roads. The fitting of off-road tyres must be mandatory. With the exception of agricultural workers, if the owners need to travel from one non-surfaced place to another, they must be required to obtain special police permission for every journey, detailing the date, locations and route to be used, and paying the appropriate tax/fee per mile.
